overview: Just in time for Bonfire Night fun, join Fireman Sam and the crew in Pontypandy! Everyone is very busy as the town prepares for a rocket launch, while Norman and Mandy make an exciting discovery in the mountains. There’s even a runaway bus to stop, and a flood that engulfs the whole town. How will Fireman Sam keep everyone safe? Find out in ‘S.O.S. Sam’!  Episode List: Fireworks for Mandy Off Duty Sam Sheep Dog Trials Norman’s Ark Mike’s Rocket Three Legged Race
title: Fireman Sam SOS
